Text: it's a great download but when u go to PLay the game it ask u to UPDATE to 3.60 so u need to fix something for this GAME thanks

you can delete the update using filemanager(if ur using multiman)... just go thru /dev_hdd0/GAMES/Game folder name/UPDATE/PS3_UPDAT.PUP [INTERNAL HDD]

OR

usb:/GAMES/Game folder name/UPDATE/PS3_UPDAT.PUP [EXTERNAL HDD]
